project_plan.name: Temperature Converter Command-Line Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool in Python that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion functions for Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin
Create the command-line interface to accept user inputs for temperature and desired output unit
Write tests for the temperature conversion functions and the command-line interface
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
